title: Commutative and Associative Properties of Multiplication
text: Use the commutative and associative properties of multiplication to simplify the expression: $$\frac{1.2{10}^8}{9.6{10}^5}=\frac{1.2}{9.6} \frac{{10}^8}{{10}^5}$$
speech: Use the commutative and associative properties of multiplication to simplify the expression:  fraction, 1.2 10 to the eighth, over, 9.6 10 to the fifth,  is equal to 1.2 over 9.6 fraction, 10 to the eighth, over, 10 to the fifth,
pacedSpeech: Use the commutative and associative properties of multiplication to simplify the expression:  this expression

title: Quotient Rule of Exponents
text: Use the quotient rule of exponents to simplify the expression: $$\frac{1.2}{9.6} \frac{{10}^8}{{10}^5}=0.125{10}^3$$
speech: Use the quotient rule of exponents to simplify the expression:  1.2 over 9.6 fraction, 10 to the eighth, over, 10 to the fifth,  is equal to, 0.125 10 cubed
pacedSpeech: Use the quotient rule of exponents to simplify the expression:   1.2 over 9.6 fraction, 10 to the eighth, over, 10 to the fifth,  is equal to, 0.125 10 cubed

title: Scientific Notation
text: Rewrite the expression in scientific notation: $$0.125{10}^3=1.25\times {10}^2$$
speech: Rewrite the expression in scientific notation:  0.125 10 cubed, is equal to, 1.25 times 10 squared
pacedSpeech: Rewrite the expression in scientific notation:   0.125 10 cubed, is equal to, 1.25 times 10 squared
